amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to operate or disseminate a cell-site simulator or IMSI catcher in the United States except pursuant to a court order that identifies an individual, account, address, or personal device.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to operate or disseminate a cell-site simulator or IMSI catcher in the United States except pursuant to a court order that identifies an individual, account, address, or personal device.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A076) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A076) offered by Mr. Issa.
